text: kuchh aise log bhee hain, jo allaah ke siva doosaron ko usaka saajhee banaate hain aur unase, allaah se prem karane jaisa prem karate hain tatha jo eemaan laaye, ve allaah se sarvaadhik prem karate hain aur kya hee achchha hota, yadi ye atyaachaaree yaatana dekhane ke samay[1] jo baat jaanenge, isee samay[2] jaanate ki sab shakti tatha adhikaar allaah hee ko hai aur allaah ka dand bhee bahut kada hai, (to allaah ke siva doosare kee pooja araadhana nahin karate)
